name: Kaiju Beach Megagolf
description:
A nice, normal game of golf, complete with giant monsters and citywide destruction! Race to the raging whirlpool and leave nothing but rubble and sea foam in your wake! What better way could there be to hangout with your legendary reptilian friends?

Created for Forge Jam Summer 2020.

Game design and programming by Steven Zavala (https://flyover-games.itch.io)

Art by Carissa Vadella (https://cvadella.itch.io)

Music by Matthew Willard (https://soundcloud.com/matthew-willard-265141353)
